title: User API Tokens
description: Tokens that can be used to access Cloudflare v4 APIs.

links.title: List Tokens
links.description: List all access tokens you created.

cfRequestHeaders.description: Headers for Client API requests using API Tokens without payload.

per_page.description: Maximum number of results per page.

cfRequestHeaders.description: Headers for Client API requests using API Tokens.

Content-Type.description: Content type of the API request.

not_before.description: The time before which the token MUST NOT be accepted for processing.

expires_on.description: The expiration time on or after which the JWT MUST NOT be accepted for processing.

policies.description: List of access policies assigned to the token.

items.title: Access Policy
items.description: Describes what operations against which resources are allowed or denied.

effect.description: Allow or deny operations against the resources.

resources.description: A list of resource names that the policy applies to.

permission_groups.description: A set of permission groups that are specified to the policy.

items.description: A named group of permissions that map to a group of operations against resources.

resources.description: A list of resource names that the policy applies to.

permissions.description: A set of permissions that are specified to the policy. Each of them maps to specific operation(s) against APIs.
